item.title: Comment on Do good-looking people live longer? by Logan
item.description:
We evolved to seek out healthy-looking people to mate with; that is what attractiveness is.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/06/do-good-looking-people-live-longer.html?commentID=160773949

item.title: Comment on Do good-looking people live longer? by Math
item.description:
How much of this is just that very overweight people are both unhealthy and likely to be in lowest 1/6th of attractiveness due to being very overweight?

item.title: Comment on My very good Conversation with Joseph Stiglitz by BC
item.description:
"The philosophy that I had was that we should be one community. The fraternities tended to interfere with that."

Communists ban churches (and other non-governmental organizations) for similar reasons...

"Students from one fraternity would always sit at dinner at the same tables with the members of their fraternity"

Imagine being so obsessed with other people's lives that you want to micromanage who they have dinner with...

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/06/my-very-good-conversation-with-joseph-stiglitz.html?commentID=160773923

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/06/my-very-good-conversation-with-joseph-stiglitz.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=my-very-good-conversation-with-joseph-stiglitz
